Package menuapp.Pages

Class CustOrderPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • menuapp.Pages.CustOrderPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPage
    public class CustOrderPage
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPage
    The CustOrderPage class implements the IPage interface and facilitates the entire ordering process for customers. This class handles menu browsing, item selection and customization, cart management, order finalization, and payment. It leverages several components such as ViewMenu, CartManager, OrderManager, and BranchSelector to provide a comprehensive ordering interface.

    The class is designed to guide the user through selecting a branch, browsing the menu, adding items to the cart with optional customizations, viewing and modifying the cart, checking out, and viewing order details. It supports both dine-in and takeaway options.

    Since:
    2024-04-24
